response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment that has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its worth of $15,000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
